name: v6.2.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.2.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "87c6171c5be7b69538d4695d9ded29ae2626c5ed76a9adeedce37b63c73bef67",
    strip_prefix = "rules_nodejs-6.2.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/v6.2.0/rules_nodejs-v6.2.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: add --check_direct_dependencies to .bazelrc by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3757
* chore: in rules_js MODULE.bazel use default value for name of node.toolchain() by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3759
* fix: make CcInfo/cc dep in nodejs toolchain opt-in via include_headers attribute by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3760


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/v6.1.3...v6.2.0

name: v6.1.3
body:

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.1.3")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your `WORKSPACE.bazel` file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")

    sha256 = "0c060a1ee1fb131775064011273b4bcdc5d82a499f199da9f04d700013c2433b",
```

## What's Changed
* chore: re-enable GitHub Actions CI for PRs and green up main by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3751
* chore: enable and green up e2e/smoke and e2e/nodejs_host tests on GitHub Actions by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3752
* fix: remove unused bad symlink in nodejs_repo_host_os_alias by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3753
* chore: cleanup test targets by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3754
* chore: misc cleanup by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3755
* chore: green up macos & windows CI by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3756


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/v6.1.2...v6.1.3

name: v6.1.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.1.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "dddd60acc3f2f30359bef502c9d788f67e33814b0ddd99aa27c5a15eb7a41b8c",
    strip_prefix = "rules_nodejs-6.1.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/v6.1.0/rules_nodejs-v6.1.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update presubmit.yml by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3719
* chore: disable RBE on CI to work-around cc toolchain failures at HEAD by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3726
* refactor: remove unused run_npm from NodeInfo provider by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3725
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3723
* chore: misc cleanup by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3729
* chore: upgrade to Bazel 7.1.1 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3728
* chore: re-enable macos on Bazel CI by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3732
* fix: support node_version_from_nvmrc with bzlmod by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3730
* fix: use default node url if the user happens to explicitly set [] by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3731
* chore: add .bazelversion to e2e/smoke by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3733
* chore: correct NodeJS spelling to Node.js by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3734
* chore: support local development on MacOS ARM by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3735
* feat: update node toolchain to provide File objects by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3736
* chore: upgrade GHA CI to bazel-contrib/.github/.github/workflows/bazel.yaml@v6 by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3737
* refactor: deprecate npm_files list attribute in favor of npm_srcs depset by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3738
* refactor: all public rules and macros should be prefixed with 'nodejs_' to match convention by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3739
* refactor: rename NodeInfo npm_srcs to npm_sources by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3740
* fix: fixup backward compat on npm_path by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3741
* Update Node.js Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3742


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/v6.0.5...v6.1.0

name: v6.0.3
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.0.3")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "f36e4a4747210331767033dc30728ae3df0856e88ecfdc48a0077ba874db16c3",
    strip_prefix = "rules_nodejs-6.0.3",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/v6.0.3/rules_nodejs-v6.0.3.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Disable Bzlmod explicitly in .bazelrc by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3696
* Fix issue link by @meteorcloudy in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3697
* Avoid usage of uname and cleanup os_name logic by @dzbarsky in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3698
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3699
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3700
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3701
* Use `headers` attribute for toolchains only if it is set by @avdv in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3704
* Update MODULE.bazel by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3706
* Work properly on intel CPUs on macos. Normalize x86_64->amd64 naming in `osname()` method by @sfc-gh-ptabor in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3707
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3708
* Update update-nodejs-versions.yml by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3710
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3709

## New Contributors
* @avdv made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3704
* @sfc-gh-ptabor made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3707

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/v6.0.2...v6.0.3

name: v6.0.0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.0.0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "a833b08fc846e27a73ac2b7062e4f48cace0e72a072c6c3fa756847dc44246dd",
    strip_prefix = "rules_nodejs-6.0.0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/v6.0.0/rules_nodejs-v6.0.0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3622
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3628
* chore: update release instructions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3632
* chore(6.0): remove concatjs package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3637
* chore(6.0): remove packages by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3638
* chore(6.0): remove @bazel/esbuild package by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3640
* chore(6.x): remove cypress package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3641
* chore(6.0): remove terser package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3642
* chore(6.0): remove jasmine package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3643
* chore(6.0): remove rollup package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3644
* chore(6.0): remove typescript package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3645
* chore: update release automation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3646
* chore: bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3647
* chore(6.x): cleanup examples by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3648
* chore(6.0): remove internal typescript tools by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3649
* chore(6.0): remove pkg_web by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3651
* chore(6.0): remove @bazel/create by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3650
* chore(6.0): move providers to build_bazel_rules_nodejs by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3652
* ci: add github actions testing by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3654
* chore: bump to node 18 LTS as default by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3656
* refactor: remove rules_nodejs dependency on bazel_skylib by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3659
* chore(6.0): remove all unsupported rules and packages by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3655
* chore: restore GHA CI just for main branch by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3660
* chore: disable a failing test on windows by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3661
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3662
* chore: update bcr metadata by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3663
* chore(6.0): cleanup unused files, remove references to deleted files by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3664
* docs: restore accidentally deleted toolchains docs by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3667
* Update NodeJS versions by @paullewis in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3666
* fix typo in README.md by @troycarlson in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3670
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3668

## New Contributors
* @paullewis made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3666
* @troycarlson made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3670

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.8.2...v6.0.0

name: v6.0.0-rc0
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.0.0-rc0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "08bb7f0fd3f5252d19bbbb4b2144c0836d1fea028cd6188647ff346766d93002",
    strip_prefix = "rules_nodejs-6.0.0-rc0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/v6.0.0-rc0/rules_nodejs-v6.0.0-rc0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: update bcr metadata by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3663
* chore(6.0): cleanup unused files, remove references to deleted files by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3664
* docs: restore accidentally deleted toolchains docs by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3667
* Update NodeJS versions by @paullewis in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3666
* fix typo in README.md by @troycarlson in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3670
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3668

## New Contributors
* @paullewis made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3666
* @troycarlson made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3670

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/v6.0.0-beta1...v6.0.0-rc0

This release has no npm packages, as they were not changed since 5.8.2

upgrade with:

```
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "5dd1e5dea1322174c57d3ca7b899da381d516220793d0adef3ba03b9d23baa8e",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.8.3/rules_nodejs-5.8.3.tar.gz"],
)

# or for the core package
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "be84fb5238a2034870810b60ae66f8555db385ff931bd6f61be204732df8d4a6",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.8.3/rules_nodejs-core-5.8.3.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3622
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3628
* chore: update release instructions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3632
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3634
* chore: fix failing docs test by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3658
* refactor: remove rules_nodejs dependency on bazel_skylib by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3657


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.8.2...5.8.3

name: v6.0.0-beta1
body:
## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.0.0-beta1")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "d124665ea12f89153086746821cf6c9ef93ab88360a50c1aeefa1fe522421704",
    strip_prefix = "rules_nodejs-6.0.0-beta1",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/v6.0.0-beta1/rules_nodejs-v6.0.0-beta1.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* chore: disable a failing test on windows by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3661
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3662


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/v6.0.0-beta0...v6.0.0-beta1

name: v6.0.0-beta0
body:
## Good News

rules_nodejs is alive again, thanks to @jbedard who removed all the deprecated, unmaintained code.

This is a significantly smaller scope - it is only the "core" Bazel Module we used to ship in 5.x and earlier.
The `5.x` branch is your reference to the code before this removal.

## Using Bzlmod with Bazel 6

1. Enable with `common --enable_bzlmod` in `.bazelrc`.
2. Add to your `MODULE.bazel` file:

```starlark
bazel_dep(name = "rules_nodejs", version = "6.0.0-beta0")
```

## Using WORKSPACE

Paste this snippet into your  file:

```starlark
load("@bazel_tools//tools/build_defs/repo:http.bzl", "http_archive")
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "e53d58cf072240bba7b48c0fbd3dfaa5ebf2e005cee0bfce5f3a4ba6b813df4e",
    strip_prefix = "rules_nodejs-6.0.0-beta0",
    url = "https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/v6.0.0-beta0/rules_nodejs-v6.0.0-beta0.tar.gz",
)
```


## What's Changed
* fix: allow root repositories to override node toolchain version under bzlmod by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3626
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3622
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3628
* chore: update release instructions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3632
* chore(6.0): remove concatjs package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3637
* chore(6.0): remove packages by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3638
* chore(6.0): remove @bazel/esbuild package by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3640
* chore(6.x): remove cypress package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3641
* chore(6.0): remove terser package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3642
* chore(6.0): remove jasmine package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3643
* chore(6.0): remove rollup package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3644
* chore(6.0): remove typescript package by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3645
* chore: update release automation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3646
* chore: bzlmod by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3647
* chore(6.x): cleanup examples by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3648
* chore(6.0): remove internal typescript tools by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3649
* chore(6.0): remove pkg_web by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3651
* chore(6.0): remove @bazel/create by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3650
* chore(6.0): move providers to build_bazel_rules_nodejs by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3652
* ci: add github actions testing by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3654
* chore: bump to node 18 LTS as default by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3656
* refactor: remove rules_nodejs dependency on bazel_skylib by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3659
* chore(6.0): remove all unsupported rules and packages by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3655
* chore: restore GHA CI just for main branch by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3660


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.8.1...v6.0.0-beta0

Note: no npm packages were pushed for this release since they were unchanged since 5.8.1

WORKSPACE snippet:
```
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "764a3b3757bb8c3c6a02ba3344731a3d71e558220adcb0cf7e43c9bba2c37ba8",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.8.2/rules_nodejs-core-5.8.2.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* fix: allow root repositories to override node toolchain version under bzlmod by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3626


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.8.1...5.8.2

## What's Changed
* feat: provide @nodejs repository by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3610
* chore: turn off automation for esbuild versions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3608
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3612
* chore: add more maintenance notices on the documentation by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3615
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3616
* Upgrade rules_pkg to 0.3.0 to remove Python 2 dependency. by @rickeylev in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3620
* fix(builtin): convert pkg_web to use cjs instead of js by @KrauseStefan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3500
* fix(concatjs): resolve error with TypeScript 5.0 by @crisbeto in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3625

## New Contributors
* @rickeylev made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3620

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.7.3...5.8.1

This release contains Bazel modules only, there are no accompanying npm packages because they weren't affected.

Upgrade with:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "dcc55f810142b6cf46a44d0180a5a7fb923c04a5061e2e8d8eb05ccccc60864b",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.8.0/rules_nodejs-5.8.0.tar.gz"],
)

# or for core module
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "08337d4fffc78f7fe648a93be12ea2fc4e8eb9795a4e6aa48595b66b34555626",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.8.0/rules_nodejs-core-5.8.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* feat: provide @nodejs repository by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3610
* chore: turn off automation for esbuild versions by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3608
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3612


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.7.3...5.8.0

Update with

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "c2ad51299792d5af3b258f1dd71b3b57eff9424c2e1797d9c1d65717d95da03a",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.3/rules_nodejs-5.7.3.tar.gz"],
)
# Or for the "core" module
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "323c780aeb0dd8e27673389362b5c67cf5fd7fde6a6d5b09a94ea9af761fc29e",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.3/rules_nodejs-core-5.7.3.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3604
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3606
* fix(builtin): entry point from sources incorrectly used when binary is leveraged as tool, breaking resolution by @devversion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3605


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.7.2...5.7.3

Update with:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "0e8a818724c0d5dcc10c31f9452ebd54b2ab94c452d4dcbb0d45a6636d2d5a44",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.2/rules_nodejs-5.7.2.tar.gz"],
)
# or for the "core" module
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "40b56e18c38295425381644f4d4efebccb5c704ac313f8baf88d047a3a6b4ab3",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.2/rules_nodejs-core-5.7.2.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3591
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3593
* chore: default node should be latest v16 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3595
* fix: yarn binary is now run from separate @yarn repo by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3597
* chore: convert to yaml issue templates by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3596
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3600
* fix: check RUNFILES env variable in @bazel/runfiles helper by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3602
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3601


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.7.1...5.7.2

Update with WORKSPACE:
```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "5aae76dced38f784b58d9776e4ab12278bc156a9ed2b1d9fcd3e39921dc88fda",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.1/rules_nodejs-5.7.1.tar.gz"],
)

# or for "core" module
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "50adf0b0ff6fc77d6909a790df02eefbbb3bc2b154ece3406361dda49607a7bd",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.1/rules_nodejs-core-5.7.1.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* Added support for linux ppc64le and linux s390x by @npanpaliya in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3574
* chore: export TsConfigInfo in public interface by @sallustfire in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3578
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3579
* Fix: Deploy devserver-darwin_arm64 binary in concatjs package. by @nchavez324 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3583
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3584
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3581
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3589
* Update yarn version check by @yads in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3588

## New Contributors
* @sallustfire made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3578
* @nchavez324 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3583
* @yads made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3588

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.7.0...5.7.1

Update `WORKSPACE`:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "c29944ba9b0b430aadcaf3bf2570fece6fc5ebfb76df145c6cdad40d65c20811",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.0/rules_nodejs-5.7.0.tar.gz"],
)
# or for the "core" module
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "33e309ba281fc73626a356a839bf5e5279360e7a2caea419c45c8017b5b3f7e2",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.7.0/rules_nodejs-core-5.7.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* fix(builtin): use updated rules_js launcher logic to source RUNFILES by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3557
* fix(builtin): fix a bug where the launcher produces incorrect runfiles path on windows by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3562
* chore: remove fasterci which is often red when buildkite is green by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3571
* chore: update dependency io_bazel to v5 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3561
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3563
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3567
* feat: add npm binary & files to toolchain provider by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3570


**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.6.0...5.7.0

Upgrade with

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "b011d6206e4e76696eda8287618a2b6375ff862317847cdbe38f8d0cd206e9ce",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.6.0/rules_nodejs-5.6.0.tar.gz"],
)
# or for "core" module

http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "bce105e7a3d2a3c5eb90dcd6436544bf11f82e97073fb29e4090321ba2b84d8f",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.6.0/rules_nodejs-core-5.6.0.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* fix: canonicalize @platforms//cpu:aarch64 by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3555
* fix(typescript): include all .json in js_library DeclarationInfo by @jbedard in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3556
* feat: add support for darwin arm for concatjs by @josephperrott in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3554
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3546
* fix(builtin): properly quote env vars passed to nodejs_binary by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3553
* refactor: replace protobufjs with protobufjs-cli in examples/protobufjs by @Katee in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3543
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3529
* feat(create): introduce `--workspaceDir` flag by @mgred in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3499

## New Contributors
* @Katee made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3543

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.5.4...5.6.0

Upgrade with

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "493bb318d98bb7492cb30e534ad33df2fc5539b43d4dcc4e294a5cc60a126902",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.5.4/rules_nodejs-5.5.4.tar.gz"],
)

# or for the "core" module

http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "404fb7ee034671eb30cc04c59d217adf0a8bd04b311ece17e052fc7ecb60ac32",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.5.4/rules_nodejs-core-5.5.4.tar.gz"],
)
```

Upgrade with:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "f10a3a12894fc3c9bf578ee5a5691769f6805c4be84359681a785a0c12e8d2b6",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.5.3/rules_nodejs-5.5.3.tar.gz"],
)

# or for the "core" module

http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "5aef09ed3279aa01d5c928e3beb248f9ad32dde6aafe6373a8c994c3ce643064",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.5.3/rules_nodejs-core-5.5.3.tar.gz"],
)
```

and update `@bazel`-scoped npm packages.

## What's Changed
* fix: limit concurrency when generating BUILD files in npm_install and yarn_install by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3509
* fix(concatjs): sync with internal change to ensure it works with `tsickle` host by @devversion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3510
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3504
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3501
* fix: delete ngrx from README. Currently not used by @stdll00 in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3513

## New Contributors
* @stdll00 made their first contribution in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3513

**Full Changelog**: https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/compare/5.5.2...5.5.3

Upgrade with:

```starlark
http_archive(
    name = "build_bazel_rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "c78216f5be5d451a42275b0b7dc809fb9347e2b04a68f68bad620a2b01f5c774",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.5.2/rules_nodejs-5.5.2.tar.gz"],
)

# or for the "core" module
http_archive(
    name = "rules_nodejs",
    sha256 = "017e2348bb8431156d5cf89b6f502c2e7fcffc568729f74f89e4a12bd8279e90",
    urls = ["https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/releases/download/5.5.2/rules_nodejs-core-5.5.2.tar.gz"],
)
```

## What's Changed
* fix(builtin): remove unnecessary loader script by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3495
* Add Code Intelligence to list of adopters by @fmeum in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3496
* fix(create): make `--packageManager` flag work by @mgred in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3498
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3486
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3489

## What's Changed
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3460
* fix: deterministic output from ts_options_validator by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3462
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3471
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3473
* Update yarn versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3481
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3476
* chore: renovate bot setting to pin actions to a full length commit SHA by @naveensrinivasan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3474
* chore: remove usage of managed_directories by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3466
* ci: teardown CircleCI configuration by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3483
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3480
* Teach os_name() about freebsd-amd64 by @rickystewart in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3490
* also have jsx files as part of being a JS file by @maapteh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3488
* fix(typescript): remove protobufjs dependency by @mgred in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3491
* fix(builtin): fix an bug where a nodejs_binary would fail to resolve an npm package when the linker is disabled by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3492

## What's Changed
* chore: include node.js 18 which is now LTS by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3432
* Fix TsConfigInfo to use depset and deduplicate files (#3430) by @Andrius-B in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3431
* chore: update dependency com_github_google_go_cmp to v0.5.8 by @renovate-bot in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3427
* fix(concatjs): adding devmode to BazelOpts by @soldair in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3433
* feat: expose @nodejs_host//:bin/node without using alias by @alexeagle in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3434
* chore: Set permissions for GitHub actions by @naveensrinivasan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3437
* run fasterci on pull requests by @apesternikov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3436
* feat(rollup): support esm configurations to be provided by @devversion in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3435
* fix: set correct linking location for yarn_install using package.json from external repository by @gregmagolan in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3442
* fix(typescript): correctly process diagnostics in worker mode by @thesayyn in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3441
* fix(examples): fix architect example on m1 by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3447
* fix(docs): stray text in npm_install docs by @jfirebaugh in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3450
* Update esbuild versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3451
* Update NodeJS Versions by @mattem in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3443
* cleanup by @apesternikov in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3454
* feat(builtin): expand make vars in nodejs_binary/test env attr by @kormide in https://github.com/bazelbuild/rules_nodejs/pull/3456
